com.google.appinventor.blockseditor.jsonp
Class Util

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.blockseditor.jsonp.Util

public class Util
extends Object

Utility methods commonly used in client-side HTTP servers.

Author:
lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney), markf@google.com (Mark Friedman)

Method Summary
static String downloadFile(String url, String preferredName)
          Downloads the file specified by the given url and saves it as a temp file under preferredName, if possible.
static String downloadFileToGivenNameElseExtension(URLConnection urlConnection, String fileName)
          Downloads the file using the given URLConnection and saves it to a temp directory as a file with a supplied name unless it does not have permission to do so, in which case it saves it to the temp directory with whatever name it pleases, but with the extension of the supplied name.
static Map<String,String> downloadZipFile(URLConnection urlConnection)
          Downloads a zip file from the server, separates the zip into individual temp files and returns the temp file names.

Method Detail

downloadFile

public static String downloadFile(String url,
                                  String preferredName)
                           throws FileNotFoundException,
                                  IOException,
                                  MalformedURLException
Downloads the file specified by the given url and saves it as a temp file under preferredName, if possible. If it can't save it under preferredName it uses the extension from preferredName with the rest of the name constructed as it pleases.

Parameters:
url - the url for the file to be downloaded
preferredName -
Returns:
the full path of the temp file
Throws:
FileNotFoundException
IOException
MalformedURLException

downloadFileToGivenNameElseExtension

public static String downloadFileToGivenNameElseExtension(URLConnection urlConnection,
                                                          String fileName)
                                                   throws IOException
Downloads the file using the given URLConnection and saves it to a temp directory as a file with a supplied name unless it does not have permission to do so, in which case it saves it to the temp directory with whatever name it pleases, but with the extension of the supplied name.

Parameters:
fileName - the base name (minus path) for the temp file that we hope to be able to rename to.
Returns:
the full path of the temp file
Throws:
IOException

downloadZipFile

public static Map<String,String> downloadZipFile(URLConnection urlConnection)
                                          throws IOException
Downloads a zip file from the server, separates the zip into individual temp files and returns the temp file names. If possible, the temp files will be named the same as they were in the zip file.

Parameters:
urlConnection -
Returns:
a list of pairs of file names. The first element of the pair is the name from the zip file and the second element is the local file names
Throws:
IOException
